snippet: For longer than anyone has recorded history, water has bubbled from out of the ground at a natural spring in what used to be deep woods about an hour's drive down a two-lane road south of Columbia....

headline.print_headline: SC's Healing Springs Still Draw People Who Believe
headline.main: SC's Healing Springs Still Draw People Who Believe

lead_paragraph: For longer than anyone has recorded history, water has bubbled from out of the ground at a natural spring in what used to be deep woods about an hour's drive down a two-lane road south of Columbia.
